start.text: Let them come... they meet their doom.
This will be over soon, they're nothing more than a training exercise.

start_boss.text: Fear ensures loyalty. We die here or we live another day.
They honor us with an actual threat now.

retreat.text: I leave now, do not fail me.

engaged.text: The end of day is upon them!

running.text: Oh forgive me, I have failed thee.

hull_90.text: Spare them none, for they will give us nothing as well!
Pain now, reward in the afterlife!

hull_50.text: Only in damage control are we truly tested!

death.text: Glory to the first man to die!
I will have someone's head for this.

victory.text: It is only fitting we be victorious in any battle.
